title: Sale: Lululemon, Everlane, Baggu, KitchenAid, Anthropologie
text:
34 items in this article 33 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the Retailers

You may have noticed some posts from our friends at the Strategist on the Cut. They’ll be dropping in every now and again, sharing their expertise on the basics you don’t have time to research and the weird and wonderful things you don’t yet know you need.

This week’s edition of Friday Sales is all about getting ready for fall, and there’s lots of stuff on sale that’ll keep you warm and help you through this transitional weather, like a packable vest from Lululemon, a Sherpa fleece-lined jacket, and suede Chelsea boots.

Free People Wallflower Midi Dress $62 (was $148, now 58% off) Macy’s is having a VIP Sale that’s open to anyone who uses the code “VIP” at checkout, and the discount (up to 30 percent) is applicable to a bunch of already on-sale items, like this long-sleeved, floral Free People dress. $62 at Macy's Buy with code: VIP

KitchenAid 3.5 Quart Artisan Mini Stand Mixer $372 (was $413, now 10% off) If you’re looking to get a head start on Thanksgiving prep, this apartment-size KitchenAid stand mixer is 10 percent off. $372 at Macy's Buy with code: VIP

Lauren Ralph Lauren Spencer Cotton Sateen Border Full/Queen Duvet Cover $141 (was $335, now 58% off) Or, if you’re getting the duvet out of storage, now’s also a good time to refresh your duvet cover. The clean lines and navy-blue border of this one remind us of interior-designer-approved (and much more expensive) Frette. $141 at Macy's Buy with code: VIP

Nike Men's Club Crew Fleece Sweatshirt $35 (was $40, now 13% off) There’s also a bunch of things on sale at Macy’s that don’t require a code, like this Nike fleece sweatshirt that has a little more texture, and thus looks a bit more fashion-y, than your standard cotton crewneck sweatshirt. $35 at Macy's Buy

Bali Cotton Double Support Wireless Bra $13 (was $40, now 68% off) This very supportive-looking wireless bra is just $13, no discount code required. $13 at Macy's Buy

Food52 x GreenPan Nonstick Skillet Set, 10" & 12" $79 (was $99, now 20% off) These GreenPan skillets from Food52 are functional, made with nonstick, nontoxic ceramic, surprisingly chic (those brass handles) — and, importantly, 20 percent off right now. $79 at Food52 Buy

Clarks Women's Raisie Eletta Penny Loafer $59 (was $95, now 38% off) This pair of penny loafers doesn’t appear to be on sale at Walmart, but the list price is usually $95, making this functionally a 38 percent discount. $59 at Walmart Buy

Lululemon Pack It Down Vest $99 (was $148, now 33% off) Lululemon’s lightweight down vest comes with its own stuff sack, making it easy to take along in this unpredictable, between-seasons weather. $99 at Lululemon Buy

Lululemon Calm and Serene Tank $29 (was $44, now 34% off) This yoga tank top is kind of a like a mullet: simple in the front, with built-in ventilation in the back. $29 at Lululemon Buy

Therapedic Cool and Fresh King Pillow $17 (was $25, now 32% off) If you can’t remember the last time you bought a new pillow, it might be time to replace it. This king-size one is cooling and designed to suit all types of sleepers. $17 at Bed Bath & Beyond Buy

ELOQUII Belted Wide Leg Crop Jeans $30 (was $60, now 50% off) We like the ruched waist detailing on these now half-off Eloquii jeans. $30 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Urban Decay Naked Cherry Highlight and Blush Palette $13 (was $34, now 62% off) If your goal is to look glowy and rosy this fall, this Urban Decay palette is a good place to start. $13 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Lou & Grey Fluid Jogger Pants $45 (was $90, now 50% off) These shiny twill joggers from Lou & Grey look too nice to wear while lounging at home, but also so comfortable that we wouldn’t blame you if you did. $45 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

The North Face Arise and Align Mid-Rise Pants $46 (was $90, now 49% off) On the other end of the joggers spectrum are these moisture-wicking, drapey workout pants from the North Face, which are almost 50 percent off at Zappos. $46 at Zappos Buy

New Balance 997 Sport $85 (was $132, now 36% off) Some ugly-but-cool New Balance sneakers at Huckberry. $85 at Huckberry Buy

Penfield Schoening Winter Jacket $120 (was $240, now 50% off) This mustard-y workwear/bomber jacket from New England-based brand Penfield is lined with sherpa fleece. $120 at Huckberry Buy

Tumi Voyageur - Just in Case Nylon Travel Backpack $70 (was $100, now 30% off) Another packable pick: This backpack is light enough to fold down flat, but it still has lots of signature Tumi features, like a sturdy nylon exterior. $70 at Nordstrom Buy

Eileen Fisher Tencel Lyocell Blend Shirtdress $89 (was $178, now 50% off) A versatile Eileen Fisher shirtdress that can be dressed up or down, with or without tights. $89 at Nordstrom Buy

Acne Studios Climb High-Rise Skinny-Leg Jeans $130 (was $260, now 50% off) Mint-green high-waisted jeans from Acne that also have a bit of stretch to them. $130 at Matches Fashion Buy

Citizens of Humanity Olivia Crop High Rise Slim $129 (was $198, now 35% off) Some light-washed high-rise jeans from Citizens of Humanity at Revolve. $129 at Revolve Buy

L'Academie Lenny Mini Bucket Bag $76 (was $168, now 55% off) This mini suede bucket bag feels like the autumnal take on summer’s baskets-as-bags trend. $76 at Revolve Buy

Herschel Supply Co. Trade Carry On Suitcase $126 (was $180, now 30% off) A very practical carry-on suitcase from Herschel in a hard-to-miss orange (so you might not even need a luggage tag). $126 at Revolve Buy

Photo: Courtesy Retailer A.P.C. Striped Pullover Sweatshirt $126 (was $180, now 30% off) In this week’s issue of the print magazine, we went deep into the history of stripes, and this striped pullover from French brand A.P.C. is very much on-theme. $126 at East Dane Buy

Baggu Duck Bag $20 (was $34, now 41% off) As is this striped Baggu duck bag. $20 at Baggu Buy

Owlet Smart Sock 2 Baby Monitor $249 (was $299, now 17% off) This one is a bit out of left field, but if you Velcro the Owlet smart baby monitor to your baby’s foot, it’ll track their heart rate and oxygen levels and let you know, via a phone app, if something is wrong. It’d make a good gift for a worried parent-to-be, and it’s also rarely on sale. $249 at Buy Buy Baby Buy

Anthropologie Plus-Size Hollis Tie-Front Trench Vest $60 (was $170, now 65% off) This trench vest can be worn like a dress, or thrown over a white T-shirt and jeans. $60 at Anthropologie Buy

Everlane The Japanese GoWeave Swing Skirt $50 (was $100, now 50% off) Part of the appeal of Everlane’s GoWeave fabric is that it’s flowy and not-too-hot, but this black and purple floral swing skirt would still look great with a pair of black tights come fall. $50 at Everlane Buy

Urban Outfitters Meadow Floral Sheet Set $39 (was $59, now 34% off) There’s a bunch of bedding on sale at Urban Outfitters, too, including these delicate floral sheets. $39 at Urban Outfitters Buy

MOTHER Superior Swooner Crop Jeans $107 (was $268, now 60% off) Some kicky, wide-legged cropped jeans from Mother Denim. $107 at Shopbop Buy

Z Supply The Nova Crew Tee $19 (was $38, now 50% off) More stripes on sale, this time at Shopbop. $19 at Shopbop Buy

Michael Kors Lottie Chelsea Boots $131 (was $175, now 25% off) This is exactly the right weather to wear these black suede Chelsea boots. $131 at Shopbop Buy

Clinique Moisture Surge 72 Hour Auto-Replenishing Hydrator (1.0 oz.) $11 (was $21, now 48% off) If you’re already starting to feel the effects of dryer, cooler weather on your skin, now’s a good time to stock up on this Clinique hydrating moisturizer, since it’s nearly 50 percent off at Ulta. $11 at Ulta Beauty Buy

get the strategist newsletter Actually good deals, smart shopping advice, and exclusive discounts. Email Terms & Privacy Notice By submitting your email, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Notice and to receive email correspondence from us.

The Strategist is designed to surface the most useful, expert recommendations for things to buy across the vast e-commerce landscape. Some of our latest conquests include the best acne treatments, rolling luggage, pillows for side sleepers, natural anxiety remedies, and bath towels. We update links when possible, but note that deals can expire and all prices are subject to change.
description: This edition of our Friday Sales roundup includes discounted goodies from Lululemon, Everlane, Nike, Clarks, KitchenAid, Anthropologie, Urban Outfitters, Mother Denim, and more.
